column3:
The 14th World Championship in Military and Sports All-round competitions (MSAC) was held in Ukraine in the city of Kharkov from November 22 to 24, 2019

About 300 athletes from 16 countries of the world took part in the competitions.

The fights were very intense and exciting. Also, high-level masters competed in versions of the demonstration of technology - kata and combat techniques.

In the overall classification, the command places were distributed in an offensive manner:

- 1st place - team of Ukraine

- 2nd place - the team of Belarus

- 3rd place - Turkmenistan team

column2: Sergey Zaytscev - The President of the International Organization has retired
column3:
On November 23, 2019, during The 14th World Championship at the Congress of Heads of Separate Units of the International Organization and The All-Ukrainian Federation of Military and Sports all-round competitions, Federation President Sergei Zaitsev announced his decision to terminate his powers of the President of the All-Ukrainian Federation and The International Organization in connection with the deterioration of health

Thanks to Sergey Zaitsev for all the hard work for decades! All sportsmen wish you Good luck and success!

column2: New leadership positions in The International and Ukraine National Federations
column3:
At a meeting of representatives of international divisions of the International Organization, Levin Volodymyr was elected to the post of President of the International Organization.

Also Yaroshevsky Andriy was elected on the post of The President of the All-Ukrainian Federation by open voting.

We wish you success, inspiration and fruitful work for the benefit of our federation in the international and national arena!

column2: Congratulation Mr. ABDOUL SORE on joining the International Organization
column3:
During The 14th World Championship in Military and Sports All-round competitions (MSAC) that was held in Ukraine in the city of Kharkov from November 22 to 24, 2019 The ELITE SPORT MANAGEMENT organization represented by Mr. ABDOUL SORE was given the right to carry out activities on the development of MSAC in the country of BURKINA FASO.

We wish you success, inspiration and fruitful work for the benefit of our federation in the international and national arena!

column2: Postponding of The European Championship MSAC
column3:
Dear Colleagues!

Due to a temporary ban on mass events in connection with the spread of the coronavirus epidemic The European Championship MSAC was postponed to 05-07 June 2020.

We wish you good health!

Today on the 23-th of June Mr. Peter Kalinin - The Vice-President of the International organization of MSAC celebrates his birthday.

Dear Mr. Kalinin!

Happy Birthday to you! Wishing you always be healthy, happy and may you have many more birthdays to come!!

Let your all the dreams to be on fire and light your birthday candles with that. Have a gorgeous birthday

Today on the 7-th of June Mr. Stanislav Holodkov - Regional Representative of the International Organization of MSAC in USA celebrates his birthday.

Dear Mr. Stanislav Holodkov!

You are always a motivational person to do challenging things in life. Keep inspiring us to do great things, happy birthday!!

Your passion, obsession, dedication towards the martial arts are impeccable. Stay with it, happy birthday!
